thread.title: Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh break-up? Here's what the 'Padmavati' star has to say! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh break-up? Here's what the 'Padmavati' star has to say! | Zee News

title: Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh break-up? Here's what the 'Padmavati' star has to say! | Zee News
text:
Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh break-up? Here's what the 'Padmavati' star has to say! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Saturday, February 25, 2017 - 11:14 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood's one of the most talked-about romances at present happens to be that of Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone. Well, the duo has never really accepted their relationship status in public but there have been way too many giveaways hinting at them being together. 
However, recently there was a strong rumour that the two might no longer be together and that they too like other B-Town couples have hit a rough patch. But when the 'xXx: Return of Xander Cage' actress was quizzed about it, she refuted the rumours in her own style. 
According to Pinkvilla.com, at a recent media interaction, when Deepika was asked whether the two are no longer seeing each other, she said, “What? Which news?" On further prodding, she said, "What do you think? (still smiling) What would you like me to be? I'd be whatever you want me to be.” MUST READ Deepika Padukone answers question on rumours about her plans to attend Oscar Awards 
Now, that's a smart answer Dippy. Incidentally, her 'xXx...' co-star in an interview had addressed Ranveer as Deepika's boyfriend. Also, the director of the film DJ Caruso had called the 'Befikre' actor as the actress' boyfriend while expressing his desire to cast the two in a film. 
Do we really need anymore hints? The two look fabulous together and will be seen in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Padmavati starring Shahid Kapoor besides them. First Published: Saturday, February 25, 2017 - 11:12 More from zeenews
